definitions: She suspends or is suspended from above with the lower part dangling free.
She kills by suspending by the neck.
She attaches or is attached to a wall or other surface.
She remains in the air for a period of time.
She waits or lingers in a place.
examples: She hangs the picture on the wall.
She hangs her coat in the closet.
She hangs around with her friends.
She hangs her head in shame.
She hangs the laundry out to dry.
